statement.p: In 1993, the moose population in a park was measured to be 4520. By 1999, the population was measured again to be 5420. If the population continues to change linearly:
Find a formula for the moose population, \displaystyle{P}, in terms of \displaystyle{t}, the years since 1990.
What does your model predict the moose population to be in 2007?
